56 typedef enum {
57  BGPSTREAM_DATASOURCE_STATUS_ON, /* current data source is on */
58  BGPSTREAM_DATASOURCE_STATUS_OFF, /* current data source is off */
59  BGPSTREAM_DATASOURCE_STATUS_ERROR /* current data source generated an error */
60 } bgpstream_datasource_status_t;
61 
62 
63 
64 typedef struct struct_bgpstream_datasource_mgr_t {
65  bgpstream_data_interface_id_t datasource;
66  // datasources available
67 #ifdef WITH_DATA_INTERFACE_MYSQL
68  bgpstream_mysql_datasource_t *mysql_ds;
69  char *mysql_dbname;
70  char *mysql_user;
71  char *mysql_password;
72  char *mysql_host;
73  unsigned int mysql_port;
74  char *mysql_socket;
75  char *mysql_dump_path;
76 #endif
77 
78 #ifdef WITH_DATA_INTERFACE_SINGLEFILE
79  bgpstream_singlefile_datasource_t *singlefile_ds;
80  char *singlefile_rib_mrtfile;
81  char *singlefile_upd_mrtfile;
82 #endif
83 
84 #ifdef WITH_DATA_INTERFACE_CSVFILE
85  bgpstream_csvfile_datasource_t *csvfile_ds;
86  char *csvfile_file;
87 #endif
88 
89 #ifdef WITH_DATA_INTERFACE_SQLITE
90  bgpstream_sqlite_datasource_t *sqlite_ds;
91  char *sqlite_file;
92 #endif
93 
94 #ifdef WITH_DATA_INTERFACE_BROKER
95  bgpstream_broker_datasource_t *broker_ds;
96  char *broker_url;
97  char **broker_params;
98  int broker_params_cnt;
99 #endif
100 
101  // blocking options
102  int blocking;
103  int backoff_time;
104  bgpstream_datasource_status_t status;
105 } bgpstream_datasource_mgr_t;
106 
107 
108 /* allocates memory for datasource_mgr */
109 bgpstream_datasource_mgr_t *bgpstream_datasource_mgr_create();
110 
111 void bgpstream_datasource_mgr_set_data_interface(bgpstream_datasource_mgr_t *datasource_mgr,
112  const bgpstream_data_interface_id_t datasource);
113 
114 int bgpstream_datasource_mgr_set_data_interface_option(bgpstream_datasource_mgr_t *datasource_mgr,
115  const bgpstream_data_interface_option_t *option_type,
116  const char *option_value);
117 
118 /* init the datasource_mgr and start/init the selected datasource */
119 void bgpstream_datasource_mgr_init(bgpstream_datasource_mgr_t *datasource_mgr,
120  bgpstream_filter_mgr_t *filter_mgr);
121 
122 void bgpstream_datasource_mgr_set_blocking(bgpstream_datasource_mgr_t *datasource_mgr);
123 
124 int bgpstream_datasource_mgr_update_input_queue(bgpstream_datasource_mgr_t *datasource_mgr,
125  bgpstream_input_mgr_t *input_mgr);
126 
127 /* stop the active data source */
128 void bgpstream_datasource_mgr_close(bgpstream_datasource_mgr_t *datasource_mgr);
129 
130 /* destroy the memory allocated for the datasource_mgr */
131 void bgpstream_datasource_mgr_destroy(bgpstream_datasource_mgr_t *datasource_mgr);
